callback_with_context.context_function_id: Format(GetIfElse(StoredContext("CcoCampaignBuildingSlot").CanAffordInstantUpgrade == false, Loc("instant_building_cannot_afford"), Loc("instant_building_tooltip")), Icon, AbsoluteValue) + GetIfElse(StoredContext("CcoCampaignBuildingSlot").SettlementContext.IsUnderSiege, Loc("instant_building_under_siege"), "")

localised_text.tooltip_text: Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to construct this building.
[[col:red]]This structure must be demolished in order for another building to be constructed in its place.[[/col]]
Building health||This building is damaged. It can either be fully repaired for a cost, or slowly repair itself over time.
Required technology not yet researched.||Left-click to display the technology chain for this item.
Construction turns left||You are currently building this item.
Turns to cycle to this level
Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to construct this building.
Required settlement level for this building to automatically construct
Construction turns left||You are currently building this item.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(IsContextValid(self.ParentContext("building_browser")), GetIfElse(IsEmpty == false && CanShowOptionsPopup && (IsPrimary == false || CharacterContext.MilitaryForceContext.IsFixedCamp == false), self.SetProperty("mouseover", "options_list"), self.SetProperty("mouseover", "")), GetIfElse(IsEmpty && ShouldShowCategoriesPopup, self.SetProperty("mouseover", "building_categories_popup"), GetIfElse(CanShowUpgradeOptions, self.SetProperty("mouseover", "building_construction_popup"), self.SetProperty("mouseover", ""))))
